sources.title: Porky's Building (1937)
sources.description: Porky is out to get the building contract for a new city hall but has to outwit Dirty Diggs, his rival, to do so.

metadata.Plot: Building contractors Porky Pig and Dirty Diggs are in a bidding war for the deal to build the new town hall. When both offer the same low bid (down to the penny), the city's mayor declares that both contractors will build their buildings...and whoever finishes first will get the contract.
metadata.Actors: Mel Blanc, Tedd Pierce, Billy Bletcher
